result.content:
Heaven. Madman biggest problem now left is: how to defeat the visiting Atletico Madrid at home For Mussina, the advent of World War II until the good news one after another. On the last training session before the game, the Blues appeared a surprising figure — he is with Atletico Madrid in the first leg game injured goalkeeper Petr Cech after the Blues goalkeeper has been news that the season. But when the "Sky Sports" reporter asked the injury situation, Cech said he can play the game against Atletico Madrid.Not only is Cech, Terry had lying on the injury list is also returned to the training ground, according to "The Sun" revealed: "Terry let everyone surprised, he is a tough guy, if he had no adverse reactions played crucial Champions League semi-final. "FriendAlthough this season Atletico fame, also remains unbeaten in the Champions League, but more people are optimistic about the final Chelsea can qualify for the finals. After all, the Blues have been unbeaten in the nike free 3.0 v4 mujer last 15 games against the Spanish team in the game, while Atletico 9 guest England victory only once.Supporting data on only one side, so that there Mussina relieved referee candidates — Italy Jinshao Rizzoli.From personal relationships, the Rizzoli and Mourinho a good relationship. 2008-2009 Serie A season, 26, is Rizzoli's "help", Mourinho coached Inter Milan 1:3 behind in case tied to Rome, to ensure that the advantages of the standings. It is after that game, Mourinho publicly declared: "Rizzoli is my friend."CautiousFirst leg matches, not good attacking positions in the face of the Chelsea brand Atletico coach is no good way. The expedition England, Atletico are also likely to show their ability to "swing coach" in the Stamford Bridge.Simone does not hide such tactics thinking, he fears Chelsea's squad depth, "There is no doubt that Chelsea are a strong team, because even if they are substantial rotation in the league last week, still beat his opponent 2-0, I know he is now talking about how a team, we are also very clear that the team will be in the field has brought us much trouble. "Argentines have

been carefully stressed that "this game, do not lose the ball is the most critical, so calmly in a game there may be a better outcome."And if Chelsea and Atletico Madrid in the second round and the result was a 0-0 Menzhan (including overtime), they will go into a penalty shootout. But both teams score in the penalty shootout not how, Chelsea 4 WWI shootout wins, 3 losses, Atletico Madrid 3 shootout is all lose.Chelsea 2-0 win over Liverpool last round, winning the Red Army suffered heavy losses plan, Rogers said after the game Liverpool boss Mourinho took a "swing bus" tactics, he expressed disdain. However, according to Mourinho revealed that Rogers pleaded his mouth, but in fact has served privately ornike free 3.0 v5 hombre soft bottom, Liverpool manager sent him a text message to congratulate the Blues Away victory.Mourinho said: "Rogers is a very excellent coach is also my friend, I've known for many years with him, when he was quite young as youth team coach, teaching some of the kids how to play. Rogers said those words after the game Of course I heard, but I also know that today he said to me some of what he told me, to congratulate Chelsea win a beautiful game, team performance is praise indeed. ""Rogers has always been regarded me as his friend, this is one of my very favorite people, so now I prefer to forget him after the game what some say, but only remember him today expressed Rogers is A very wise man, I am sure he watched the video game after the game, I think he is now presumably have to figure out what happened in the end all. "Beijing tomorrow morning, will meet in the Champions League semi-final at Stamford Bridge in London to the last game, beating Chelsea set to usher Atletico challenge. A week ago, Chelsea face Atletico

Kuanggong blue bus stays. This time back home, if Atletico advanced the ball, Chelsea will certainly fall into a passive, so I am afraid that Mourinho will be to hold onto the main. But Atletico coach Simeone is not fuel-efficient lights, Mourinho wants to be in the Champions League history to lead a team into the Champions League final three coach, is not so easy.Blue ImperviableKeep perfect case of strong intensityRed and blue at the weekend Premiership battle, Chelsea bench under almost all circumstances dispatched 2-0 win over Liverpool, following the first leg 0-0 draw with Atletico Madrid, Mourinho once again show the world his swing coach capabilities.Although Mourinho conservative voices constantly questioned, but had to admit that this madman's tactical system is getting more perfect, and received a miraculous strong dialogue in this season against Manchester City, Liverpool, Arsenal and Manchester United 8 game, the Blues made a great record of 7 wins and 1 level. Mourinho's former favorite disciples Deco also recently said: "As long as the players can faithfully execute his nike free run 3 mujer tactics, I believe Chelsea can enter the Champions League final."Even Atletico coach Simeone admits: "Do not look down upon any Chelsea player, even a substantial rotation, they are a strong team, I know that he is now talking about how a team, we are also very clear that the team will be present give us much trouble on. "Red and white cocoonYour site moves youAlthough Chelsea powerful striking war record, but also in the case of the remaining two rounds of the Premier League is still two points behind Liverpool, winning depend on others face. The reason, in addition to the referee issue, the Blues biggest weakness is broken intensive bad defensive ability, often lowly attack to score points. That is, when the opponent swing coach, but there is no way the Blues.Like Chelsea, Atletico also known tactical ability, this season to beat Real Madrid in La Liga, Barcelona standings ranked first, largely focusing on defense and head coach Simeone and Fanqiang promote efficient counterattack about
